attributes.additional_details: As someone with a visual impairment trying to use ticket machines can be difficult, frustrating and hard. My creating unmanned ticket offices the government would be discriminating against older and disabled people.
attributes.background: Make sure there is funding for every train ticket office to be manned

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636542
